Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob,

I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe has the potential to significantly enhance your business operations and achieve remarkable results. Our product is meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and efficiency, offering unparalleled benefits to those who utilize it.

I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950000. This offer is tailored to recognize your early interest and commitment to innovation in your field.

Please consider this as an investment in your future success. If you are interested in exploring how our product can revolutionize your business, I would be delighted to arrange a personalized demonstration and discuss the specific ways in which it can address your unique needs.

Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together and contributing to your business's growth.

Best regards,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
